com.kiwiwearables.kiwilib

Class Motion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kiwiwearables.kiwilib.Motion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Motion
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The Motion object contains information about a pre-recorded motion.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      String deviceName
      Device that was used to create this motion
      String motionId
      ID of the motion.
      String motionName
      Human-readable name of the motion
      int threshold
      Threshold of the motion Score must be lower than this value to be detected
